thread.title: Mary Gallagher
thread.title_full: Consumers Plumbing reviewed by Mary Gallagher

author: Mary Gallagher
title: Mary Gallagher
text:
The button on my Grohe kitchen faucet - the one that lets you choose either a spray or a stream of water - had the protective covering disintegrate. There was no way to replace this so we had to buy the entire end of the faucet.
Consumer's Plumbing replied quickly to my inquiry with all of the facts and figures. When I was ready to order it was simply a matter of pushing the "order" button. Service was quick and the part arrived on the time promised!
